rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with ramps and tactile guiding paths, ensuring easy access.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows for natural light and ventilation. Incorporates energy efficient design features.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen; designed to foster family interactions with eco-friendly materials.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Energy-efficient appliances and sustainable materials. Wheelchair accessible counter heights.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated entertainment space with soundproofing and eco-friendly lighting solutions.

openings.description: Large windows to allow ample natural light. Incorporates energy efficient glass.
Wheelchair accessible door with ramps and tactile guidance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite designed according to Vastu principles, with an en-suite bathroom and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring sufficient light and cross ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom designed for additional family members or guest use, compliant with local building norms.

openings.description: Balconies on bedrooms providing natural light and ventilation, designed according to Vastu principles.
Large windows ensuring ample natural light with energy efficient designs.

rooms.name: Study Room/Office
rooms.description: Multi-functional space suitable for work or study with ergonomic design and good natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious guest room ensuring privacy and comfort.

openings.description: Energy efficient windows for optimal natural light while preserving thermal insulation.
Wheelchair accessible staircase and elevator system connecting floors.
